page.title: 09A PUPIL'S DAY IN CUMNOCK
page.content: The worst thing in a pupil's life is getting up in the morning. Even in winter it is freezing cold because girls have to wear skirts and some people do not get a free bus pass in the winter and the school is sometimes cold. When I get to school, I have to report to my tutor and if you come in late you have to go to your tutor then the school office to register. On a Monday I get two periods of art together. It is good but the periods go in very slowly. Biology is good but involves too much writing. English is sometimes all right but essay writing and copying from the blackboard is boring. History is good and usually interesting.
